t:
The attack left us devastated. But the arrival of the saint showed us rays of hope.

His spells changed the bullets into rose petals.
The spells changed the shrapnel into butterflies,
            the blood changed to sweet scent.


But it couldn't change the corpses back to my wife and children.
c:
As a tribute to the #nrsmch attack in Kolkata. Yeah, kind of.
